Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

CHAPTER 1274 Mobile Home Parks

1274.01Location; status as conditional use and planned unit development. 1274.02Density; minimum lot size. 1274.03Frontage, width and depth. 1274.04Side and rear yards. 1274.05Location and size of sites and structures; improvements.

CROSS REFERENCES

Occupying travel trailers while in motion -see TRAF. 440.08

Planned unit developments - see P. & Z. 1272

Schedule of District Regulations - see P. & Z. Title 6, Appx. A
